      • canOpen

        boolean canOpen(URI uri)
        Checks if this connection factory can handle this URI.

        Returns:
        true if the URI can be provided, otherwise false

                     throws IOException
        Creates a new connection
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IOException - if the connection can not be established
